column2: The sound of the darkness seeping into the minds of those who come face to face with the Father in Shadow.
Bel'akor is an ancient being of magic and chaos. He has a high affinity to the winds of magic.
Bel'akor is an ancient being of magic and chaos. The winds are bending to his every whim.
Bel'akor can barely contain his rage. Once his concentration wavers, he is prone to rampage through his enemies with an unholy fury.
